trans-unit.source: Provides the Authenticode X.509v3 digital signature of a code assembly as evidence for policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller en kod sammansättning som bevis för principutvärdering Authenticode X.509v3 digitala signatur.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: The presence of Publisher evidence produces a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission> in the grant set.
trans-unit.target: Förekomsten av utgivare bevis producerar en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission>i beviljandet.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission>

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission>, the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission> that corresponds to the Publisher evidence will be compared with the demanded permission.
trans-unit.target: Om det finns en <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>för <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission>som motsvarar utgivaren bevis ska jämföras med den begärda behörigheten.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Publisher evidence is based on Authenticode X.509v3 signatures.
trans-unit.target: Publisher bevis baseras på Authenticode X.509v3-signaturer.

trans-unit.source: By default, code access security (CAS) does not check for Publisher evidence.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kontrollerar inte kodåtkomstsäkerhet (CAS) för utgivaren bevis.

trans-unit.source: Unless your computer has a custom code group based on the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition> class, you can improve performance by bypassing Authenticode signature verification.
trans-unit.target: Om datorn har en anpassad kodgrupp baserat på den <xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition>klass, kan du förbättra prestanda genom att kringgå Authenticode signaturverifiering.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by configuring the runtime to not provide Publisher evidence for CAS.
trans-unit.target: Detta åstadkoms genom att konfigurera inte tillhandahåller Publisher bevis för Certifikatutfärdare.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to configure this option and which applications can use it, see the element.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du konfigurerar det här alternativet, och kan program använda den, se elementet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref> class with the Authenticode X.509v3 certificate containing the publisher's public key.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref> klass med Authenticode X.509v3-certifikat som innehåller utgivarens offentliga nyckel.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> that contains the software publisher's public key.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> som innehåller den programvaruutgivare offentliga nyckel.

trans-unit.source: The cert parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The cert parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the publisher's Authenticode X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar utgivarens Authenticode X.509v3-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: The publisher's <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utgivarens <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Skapar ett nytt objekt som är en kopia av den aktuella instansen.

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Ett nytt objekt som är en kopia av den här instansen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en motsvarande kopia av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny, identisk kopia av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an identity permission that corresponds to the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en identity-behörighet som motsvarar den aktuella instansen av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> from which to construct the identity permission.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> som du vill skapa behörigheten identitet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"> </xref> för den angivna <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref> to the specified object for equivalence.
trans-unit.target: Jämför aktuellt <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref> till det angivna objektet för likvärdiga.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> objects are equal if they designate the same software publisher certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>objekt är lika om de anger samma certifikatet.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref> to test for equivalence with the current object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref> för överensstämmelse med det aktuella objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two instances of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref> class are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om två instanser av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref> klass är lika, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The o parameter is not a object.
trans-unit.target: Den o parametern är inte en objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code of the current <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar hash-koden för aktuellt <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the current <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>.
trans-unit.target: Hash-koden för aktuellt <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher.Certificate*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en strängrepresentation av aktuellt <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En representation av aktuellt <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Publisher"> </xref>.
